GETTING STARTED:

1ï¸âƒ£ Download Your Wallet  
- Android: Get the Jasiri Mobile Vault here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jasiriwallet&pcampaignid=web_share .

- iOS & Android: Download the Pera Algorand Wallet for iOS(https://apps.apple.com/us/app/pera-algo-wallet/id1459898525) or Android(https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.algorand.android&hl=en)

- Create your self-custody account and opt-in to UNLOCK Asset (Asset ID: 1256765304) in the "Assets" section of your Pera or Jasiri Wallet.

*Buy 1-2 ALGO Tokens (worth $0.12 each) via debit/credit card, p2p or bank transfer on Pera, Jasiri Wallets, or earn free ALGO on Coinbase and then transfer it to your Pera/Jasiri Wallet Address: https://www.coinbase.com/earn/algorand . The Algorand Network, which we use to record transactions, charges small transaction fees of 1 ALGO or less for decentralization and to prevent bot actions, making your experience safer, legitimate, and more secure.

2ï¸âƒ£ Add the Jasiri E-commerce Browser Add-on to your Google Chrome Browser. Google Chrome is a multi-platform browser that works on MacOS, Windows, ChromeOS, and Linux.

3ï¸âƒ£ Activate the Add-on while on your Amazon/Alibaba/Aliexpress Account-Orders page.

4ï¸âƒ£ Connect Your Wallet by scanning the WalletConnect QR code that appears in the add-on when you click "Connect Your Wallet."

5ï¸âƒ£ Scan and Tokenize your proof-of-purchase by clicking "Show Tokenizable Orders" and selecting any smartphone, tablet, laptop, or smartwatch. Up to 70% of its USD value will be credited to your Vault account.

*To buy a smart Web3 property title, purchase USDC on your Pera or Jasiri Wallet(over 10+ payment methods are available) or through Coinbase(https://www.coinbase.com/learn/crypto-basics/what-is-usdc), then transfer to your wallet.
*USDC helps you save in 'Tokenized'/'Digital' US Dollars

6ï¸âƒ£ Buy the smart Web3 legal property title on your tokenized purchase via the add-on.

7ï¸âƒ£ Repeat! ğŸ™Œ
